info.title: DNS Tools
info.description: Resolve DNS addresses into IP addresses and vice versa. New method: check if a port is open on a given host.

get.description: Check if a port is open on a remote host.

parameters.name: host
parameters.description: The DNS or IP address of the host you want to check.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port you want to check if open.

parameters.name: dns
parameters.description: The DNS address you want to resolve.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP address you want to resolve.
